name: com.i5.toolkit.core
description: This package contains a collection of tools, features and assets for the development of Unity projects

author.name:
Benedikt Hensen
Advanced Community Information Systems
Informatik 5, RWTH Aachen University

samples.description: Example scene which shows how an app console can be integrated into a scene
Example how to import a 3D model in the .obj format at runtime from the Web
Example collection demonstrating procedural objects, e.g. with rounded corners
Example how to implement an OpenID Connect client in Unity; note: you need to add client credentials to use the example
Example how to re-use meshes with the object pool architecture to avoid memory leaks
Example scene with scene documentation objects
Examples showing how to set up services and register them with the service manager
Example how to use the spawners
